title: Quantitative level lowering for weight two Hilbert modular forms
abstract:
We generalize a result of Ribet and Takahashi on the parametrization of
elliptic curves by Shimura curves to the Hilbert modular setting. In
particular, we study the behaviour of the parametrization of modular abelian
varieties by Shimura curves associated to quaternion algebras $D$ over a
totally real field $F$, as we vary $D$. As a consequence, we obtain that on
these Shimura curves, the cohomological congruence module is equal to the ring
theoretic congruence module even in cases where we do not have multiplicity
one, thereby extending results of Manning and B\"ockle-Khare-Manning.
